content.detailedDescription: It was 1:30 late saturday early sunday morning we had just went to bed and the blindes were cracked and there was a bright enuf light it caught my eye without my contacts in so i put my glasses on and my boyfriend watched this with me there were multiple objects they were in the tree line out of my bedroom window and no they werent from cars because i live in the woods and theres no way for light from anyone that shines in.The lights changed many diffrent colors from blue to green to red to amber they moved so quik and eratic then they would dissapear.Then they would reapear back in the tree line and hover then move around quiker than anything i'v ever seen.Then the stationary light that was out my back bedroom window[i have 2 windows in room] was really low in the tree line an it was mostly a red light that got really bright and then would back off and lighten up and it went on for a long time.During all off this about there were multiple dogs that were barking for a long time then they just stopped,then my neighbors horn on there truck shorted out and stayed stuck on for almost an hour.My phone was on the charger all night and it only had one bar when i checked my phone at 5:30.Towards the end about 4;30 there was a small diamond shape bright white light that came down and hovered my back window for less than a minute then it took off through the trees.During the middle of the lights i saw it once it was a triangled shape object that had round amber lights in each corner that had a steady path through the sky and then dissapered.I wasnt scared untill the dogs quit barking and the light hovered above my bedroom window then i got scared .And i been trying to make sense of what i saw that night and i havent gotten any other explanation i felt a little crazy for a few days trying to figure out who to tell who wont look at you like you've lost your marbles so this is my story i live in the foothills of the cascades near mt hood.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: It went on for several hours shorted stuff out and it was like they knew i was watching

content.detailedDescription: Traveling n on us31 at southern edge of kokomo when an object appearing to be on fire appeared in front of us just at treetop telephone pole level from the west. others on 31 had to have seen it because everyone was hitting their brakes (10:30 pm.) not having any idea what it was we followed it a short way through a subdivision.  it ascended into the sky to the east for at least a mile and poof it disappeared just as it had appeared.  when we got home 45 minutes later two large jets flew very low over our home heading east.(grissom afb is nearby).  a friend told me they flew over again about 3:30 a.M. and woke her up.  the jets are very unusual any more since grissom is no longer a regular afb. wish we'd taken photos with our cellphones but did not have time.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Fire-like obj traveled above treetops west to east ascending. disappeared just like it appeared--poof there poof gone

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house in the middle of the day, next to a friend of mine outside trying to get the last of the summer weather. then out of nowhere he points out black objects. at first i thought that it was just ballons , and later they start to pop out one by one really fast and it happened in a matter of seconds.So without looking back i ran in the house to get a camera. as i was running back i said i do not want to lose site of the black objects. what made me first notice the objects was a large black dot which then as i fousced the camera i shot the picture then ten seconds later it was gone. as i zoomed in i noticed next to the black object there were smaller ones. my friend pionted out that there was also a glowing object behind the clouds. as if you view it on the camera the clouds were a lot whiter before i took the picture. then as i took the picture i could see that the glow was next to the big black dot and that the cloud was a lot clearer. and afterwards the cloud then become all white again. but, what got me the most was the number of objects that appeared. the black dots just disappeared out of nowhere. i also noticed after i went in thinking of what the objects were i tired to turn on the tv but it would not turn on, but as 5 minutes went by it turned back on.
content.summary: Many(15)/black/some large and some small

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house in the middle of the day, next to a friend of mine outside trying to get the last of the summer weather. then out of nowhere he points out black objects. at first i thought that it was just ballons , and later they start to pop out one by one really fast and it happened in a matter of seconds.So without looking back i ran in the house to get a camera. as i was running back i said i do not want to lose site of the black objects. what made me first notice the objects was a large black dot which then as i fousced the camera i shot the picture then ten seconds later it was gone. as i zoomed in i noticed next to the black object there were smaller ones. my friend pionted out that there was also a glowing object behind the clouds. as if you view it on the camera the clouds were a lot whiter before i took the picture. then as i took the picture i could see that the glow was next to the big black dot and that the cloud was a lot clearer. and afterwards the cloud then become all white again. but, what got me the most was the number of objects that appeared. the black dots just disappeared out of nowhere. i also noticed after i went in thinking of what the objects were i tired to turn on the tv but it would not turn on, but as 5 minutes went by it turned back on.
content.summary: Many(15)/black/some large and some small

content.detailedDescription:
What is the problem with your website?  for days when i try to look at the last 20 reports or to access the database, i get the submission form. 

surely you are aware of and can fix this erroneous link. 

let's get on it, please
content.summary: Read the detailed description...Unless everyone's on vacation or something

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 5:58am est and looking at the stars and having coffee on my porch.  i first noticed what appeared to be a satellite to my west, however it was moving pretty fast.  then around 5 minutes later, i was looking north east and i see this object just rising from behind the woods.  it's huge like a star and at first i thought that it was a helicopter. however, knowing that there are a few houses behind this woods and further down is a church and then a farm..  this could not be a helicopter. i tried to get my video camera ready to focus, however since i was in my screened-porch it was not showing up great.  so i went outside and tried to set up my tri-pod and it rose so fast that it was already above me.  (accelerated so fast) and no other lights from it.  then it started moving faster east and leaving my area.  i ran out front of the house to see if i could catch it, but it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo rises from behind the woods

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car eating the food i just got when an orange glowing sphere appeared about 300-500ft away from me. it moved slowly towards where i was sitting and was about 1000ft in the air. it was at least 100ft in diameter and after about 30sec it disappeared. i have seen at least 7 disc's, sphere's, and cigar shaped ufo's in my area over 3 months. some in the daytime, some at night. i'm 29yrs old and am sick of government and military entities keeping alien life from us. whether it's religious beliefs or the fact that us, the people, are treated like slaves and piggy banks and the government doesn't want it's money makers to leave the earth, these people need to tell the truth finally cause its long overdue. this is the last time i'm reporting what i have seen because it's not helping. mabey you, mufon, is also playing a part in this giant cover up of the greatest thing any of us humans could ever see and be a part of. theres so much undeniable proof and testimony from credible witnesses that this should be common knowledge by now. i hope that there are peace loving non superficial alien entities out there that would welcome other peaceful humans to join their society because i am sick of the lies, deceit, and deception of this government and agencies helping stupify its people and keeping them in the dark. i would give my life to have the world finally see its alien brothers. if it takes a mob of people storming into area 51, then so be it. disclosure will happen sooner than later if you like it or not. get ready evil war mongering gov't and military, cause the people are p**** and sick of your evil twisted ways.
content.summary: Sitting in car eating, object came into view, moved slowly, dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was in honokaa, big island of hawaii at 10:40 pm. after dinner my uncle, his friend and myself were on the front porch when i see an object which my first thought was a shooting star.  the area i am in when this event took place has many shooting stars every night and immediately realize it wasn't. i point and say oh s*** and the two people im with turn and look the whole time my focus remains on the object. i noticed it because i was staring right where it seems to appear out of thin air.  it was a ball of light that resembled an egg/oval/missile leaving a pretty large trail that glowed just as bright behind it.  we watched it cross the sky for about 3-5 seconds when it accelerated and the object itself expanded or glowed brighter and disappeared. the way i felt during the sighting was complete shock and awe because i thought i was witnessing an awesome shooting star and instantly realized it wasn't at the point i knew it wasn't a shooting star i knew immediately it was a ufo not a doubt in my mind.  after the sighting my adrenaline was rushing and was also a little bit freaked out.  to be honest i believe in et, aliens, other intelligent life but when i witnessed this event it put to rest any doubt there may have been.  and niether myself nor the two other persons i was with were under the influence of any type of drugs or alcohol which would be further proof that what we saw was really there.  after the whole even i did notice a plane flying in the area the object was seen, but there is a flight path to hilo international and may have been a commercial flight.  to add to the previous sentance the object seen was flying across the flight path and did not resemble anything close to an airplane-at least not one that exists on this planet that i know of.  also there was a cruise ship clearly visible at sea with all its lights on-im assuming it was a cruise ship but am more then certain since i have seen them pass by before.
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Teardrop
content.summary: Appeared from no where, shot through the sky like a bright missle/oval shape then expanded and radiated light then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to walk my dog at around 11:40 pm  i noticed a blue green laser light playing off the clouds.  the light is stationary and is over northeast boulder currently.  maybe the northern lights?  i am not sure if they could be seen in colorado.  the light has remained in place for about 30 minutes, it is still there as i type.  i woke my wife to witness this light too.

i left a 9 news tip as well for a local news channel in my area.  hoping that other people may see this light too.
content.summary: Stationary blue green laser light playing off the clouds

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were surf-fishing off cocoa beach, fl around 1 o'clock in the morning.  we had separated from one another by about 25 yards...Far enough that we couldn't hear each other over the waves.  i was just about to cast into the surf when i saw something flying slowly above over my right shoulder.  it was a bright green, fuzzy ball of light flying overhead from the land towards the water.  it flew above and between my husband and i keeping the same height and speed...About 10-20mph.  it just kept flying out over the water until it disappeared into the distance.  i started walking back towards our bait bucket thinking about what the hell i just saw.  by the time i reached the bait bucket on the beach i had convinced myself i was seeing things. but i knew i had seen something because this sighting lasted long enough to question myself about what it was i saw.  my husband had walked back too and the first thing out of his mouth was "did you see that bright green fuzzy light?!?"  i was so relieved he had seen it too, although it would have been impossible for him not to see it because it was close, flying slow and it was the middle of the night and was the brightest thing in the sky.  we have no idea what it was and we still talk about it to this day.
content.summary: Fishing off cocoa beach, fl and a bright, fuzzy, bright green object flew above us to out over the water.

content.detailedDescription: Around 12:35 am edt, i stepped outside to view a thunderstorm to the north. i noticed a number of jets and recreational planes flying around the storm. i looked at my cell phone to see what time it was (12:38 am), but when i looked almost straight up i saw what appeared to be another jet, but as the object got directly above me the light patterns were unusual; two white blinking lights with a red pulsating light at the front. the lights were in a triangular formation, and the object made a slight jet-like sound, but it was very faint. perhaps it was a jet slowing down it's engines, but the speed is what really caught my attention; i estimate the object was approximately 10,000-15,000 feet above the ground and moving over 600 mph, which would be unusual for a commercial jet. the object then moved to the east of me where it began to bank to the left (towards the northeast) appearing to fly around the thunderstorm about 7 or 8 miles to the north. this all happened within a 1 to 2 minute time frame.
content.summary: Triangular craft moving quickly across sky

content.detailedDescription: I understand that you can view the video capture at thespec.Com. i am currently writing an exam for mufon for a field investigator. i have been investigating ufo's for over 35 years and also investigated betty hill in the late 70's. please get ahold of me as soon as you can. thank you. joseph.
content.summary: Hovered over buildings and vehicles and casted a bright orange colour, came down from escarpment than headed toward lake ontario, more than one object.

content.detailedDescription:
First off i watch the sky nearly every night and i see objects that i can't explain way up and i also see lots of airplanes coming in and out of minneapolis, mn.

but anyways,

i was sitting in my living room and i went outside to smoke a cigarette on my deck when i noticed an object to the northwest that was too far away to make out the shape but it had two lights that were bluish white purple and blinked together at the same time and were horizontally parallel. then i noticed two other objects straight west that appeared to be sitting there not blinking and i really can't remember the exact color of the lights but the objects were over a mile away most likely. then a mass amount of airplanes or flying vehicles, i don't know flew all straight west. there were/was around 15-20 aerial crafts that flew all straight west....All had lights...Nothing way crazy but a large amount of traffic that i've never witnessed before and like i said i come out and watch the sky every evening and see typical airline traffic coming in and out. never have i seen this high of volume go straight west towards those object. then the most notable craft i saw was in teh shape of triangle....Orangish red lighted ends and and orange light in the middle. it flew very slow over my neighborhood and seemed at an altitude of a recent airplane take-off. it flew west and then started to turn vertical and seemed to go more southwards. 

when i first saw that object i then began to feel overwhelmed. it was like something was going on...Like "are we under attack by the chinese or something?" it was a very unusually high amount of traffic plus didn't hear any rumbling or engine....Lights were solid where airplanes usually have some blinking light.

during the incident i immediately called my uncle and talked to him while it was happening after the one noticeable aircraft flew over me. the objects kept heading west till i couldn't seem over the horizon.
content.summary: Mass ariel sighting.

content.detailedDescription: It was july 4th weekend. we live just outside city limits and was watching the city's fireworks display they have every year. fireworks was in our front view. to my right i saw a redish/orange glow in the sky that was hovering, not moving. it dissappeared. i didn't say anything to anyone else. then a few minutes later my sister said what's that light in the sky? there was another one of those lights right above us. it also dissappeared. then after the fireworks ended, we saw these same lights come up from the horizon slowly one after another. after they got up to a certain point they vanished. last year on the 4th we also saw some other kinda lights that were white and they were traveling in a group of 10-12 across the sky.
content.summary: Redish lights hovering around the skys on the 4th july weekend

content.detailedDescription: It was a very cold crystal clear night. not late however traffic was very light.  we were on a short a short drive home from our families place. the object appeared in our view directly in front of us.  it looked just like the one in the shawnee state picture! it had lights like stars on every tip. it turned in front of us an cut the lights. thats it! amazing!
content.summary: This object appears to be very much the same as the one reported by shawnee state witness.

content.detailedDescription: Has the govt closed down mufon????
content.summary: Has obama shut down mufon?

content.detailedDescription: I was on the front pourch at my grannys house something caught my eye it was a gold/copper color flying saucer spinning slowley with windows all around reflecting from the light of the moon you can see inside the interior was just white i can see it very clearly the moon was on my right side the flying saucer was moving to the right it was so beatiful didnt take my eyes of it till it faded away i told everyone what i seen i will never foget its clear on mind always
content.summary: Flying saucer spins slowley windows reflect from the light of the moon interior was white

content.detailedDescription:
I recently installed an inferred outdoor security camera that i can view from a tv in my bedroom thru the vcr player. unfortunately i didnt have a tape inserted. the camera is located approximatively 10 feet east from my bedroom window. the camera is partially hidden by a tomato plant that i have planted in a pot on the edge of my driveway. at 2:30am i was sitting in bed surfing the web on my home pc. i glanced up at the tv which is attached to my wireless inferred security camera. i saw an object hovering directly in front of my camera. the object was rectangular with a definite outline all the way around. there were 2 diamond shaped in the middle of this rectangular bar. the diamonds were spaced evenly apart and evenly from each edge on all sides. it was directly in front of the camera and appeared to be investigating the small red inferred lights that make a circle around the lens. these lights are fairly bright and can be seen from a distance away. the object would hover towards the lights directly in-front of them than back up aways. it moved sided to side, up and down, towards the inferred lights and than away from the lights. each time coming back and looking directly into the lens as trying to figure out what it was. the movements were fast and sometimes appeared jerky.  the further away it went each time the fuzzier the object became. when it was directly in front of the lights hovering, the object had perfect shape and the diamonds were very visible and each diamond the same size. the further the object darted outward the less the diamonds were visible. the further out it went the fuzzier it became. i could see there was something dark in the center of the rectangle but couldn't make out the diamonds until it zoomed closer to the red inferred circle of lights as if almost touching it but never doing so.  
when i noticed this object on my tv i immediately stood up between my bed and the window that the object was at. i than dropped to the floor fearing the unknown. i slowly stood back up and turned off all lites to the room. i peaked out the side of the curtain and saw my camera but nothing else. i looked back into the tv and the object was still there and very visible. darting up and down, back and forth, and side to side. fast movements. i turned on the outside light that is approximatively 15 feet from my camera and the object. i returned to my bedroom with the outside light still on. the object was the same with no change from the light being on. i couldnt see anything thru my window only on my tv. the outside light glowed on my camera to give me some vision. i still saw nothing thru my window. after 40 from first seeing this object it disappeard. poof...Gone!
this same scenario happened 2 nights in a row at the exact time of night.  on the third nite i noticed a limb from the tomato plant was broken and blocking any vision in front of the camera. the broken limb of the plant is directly above the camera about 1 inch. that third nite i turned off the camera being the broken limb was obstructing all vision in front of the camera. it was late and very dark so i didnt venture outside to move the limb. i live in a small community outside the city rochester minnesota a fairly large city. there is lots of wooded area where i live. my car was parked inside the garage and there is no street lights where i live. there was nothing in the driveway but my camera and tomato plant...And this object. i have a new pc and for some reason it wont allow me to use my scanner, download or upload. i cant seem to take over ownership from microsoft. which leaves me with read and write privileges only. im sorry i cant include a sketch of this object.
content.summary: A small white rectangular bar with 2 diamond shapes equally spaced apart.

content.detailedDescription: Turned around to take sec.Look and it was gone
content.summary: In car look straight ahead hovering over trees

content.detailedDescription: The bright white lights pulsated quickly over the sky between satellite beach and cocoa beach florida, then quickly disappeared behind the cloud cover.
content.summary: The bright white lights pulsated quickly in and out of the clouds in a geometric pattern and over a 2 second period repeated the same pattern, then it quickly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: The object made no nose and at first hoved and the started moving in and straight line an then. the object looked as though it started to slow down and it came to an complete stop and it powered up emittng an bright light and the light faded and it went back the way it came. please inform me what this might have been.
content.summary: It flashed and blinked in and out

content.detailedDescription: On sunday august 7th, 2011, myself and my husband were at a light going north on ft. harrods dr., crossing harrodsburg rd. (lexington, ky) it was approximately 6:30 pm and the sun was still very bright in the sky. it was a cloudy day with large billowing clouds. temperature was warm to hot. while sitting at the stop light i looked to my left (i was the driver of vehicle) and i noticed an amazingly beautiful cloud formation. it looked almost like a hand holding a ball of energy... which of course, was the sun. there were beams of light beaming all across the sky. i immediately grabbed my iphone and told my husband to look at the clouds. he glanced at it, but i told him... "no, seriously, look! its gorgeous!" at that moment, i started saying out loud to myself, "please dont turn green. please don't turn green. (speaking of the stoplight.)" i grabbed my iphone and i took a series of 9 photographs of the cloud from out of the rolled down window of the car. these photographs were taken very fast. i believe all were taken in a matter of seconds because the camera on the iphone is rather fast. this proves to be very important since the photos show the object in question moving in different directions. something i believe may be worth mentioning is that we believe the light skipped us... in other words, it did not turn green for us when it should have. my husband made mention of this because he was frustrated and making a joke that if i hadn't "begged" for the light to not turn green, that we could have already made it across the street. this is ironic, simply because if the light had turned green when it should have, i never would have captured the picture, and i especially would not have had those extra seconds to take more than one photo of the cloud. so, not another thing was said or remembered about the cloud until i went to bed that night about 2 hours later. i laid down and remembered the photos and i wanted to pick the best one i took and post it on facebook. when i went to look through the photos, i did not immediately notice the object in the picture. then suddenly, i saw it. i thought, oh, thats probably just a cloud, moon, speck, whatever. but then it was in the next picture, then the next, then the next. and if you flip though the photos very fast, it appears to be moving at a very high rate of speed in different directions. and since i took the photos in under 8-10 seconds, i know there is nothing i know of that looks like that or can fly that fast. the object appears to be an orb or sphere. it is glowing white with dark shadows within the orb. it appears in the second photo suddenly. seeming to move toward the camera. then it glows with a aura of pink surrounding it almost in a saucer shape. this could be a glare from the bright sun though. it then shoots straight up very fast. im definately not a scientist, but i don't know of anything that could move that fast. also, in one photo, after close observation, not only does the orb appear in the photo, another 3 "white dots" appear to the center right. my guess is it is another orb that i caught in the photo that was moving so very fast that it left tracers behind it. again, i did not see this with my naked eye. neither did my husband. this all appeared in the photos. after realizing what we had possibly photographed. i had no clue what to do. after internet searches i was able to find the mufon site and the name and number of the former ky mufon director. i called him and spoke with him for a good hour or so. i emailed him the photos and he said he would forward it to the new director. i have not heard back as of yet. as far as my opinion goes, i may not be an educated researcher on things like this, but common sense and deduction and research go a long way. the biggest top 2 possibilities in my mind were that the image could be the moon. except its moving and after finding out where the moon was located, which was in the east, i ruled that out, since the photo is taken toward the west and we were facing north. the other thought was that it could have been a planet, but the size and the fact that it was broad daylight eliminates that. as well as the fact that it moved very fast. in retrospect, and to this moment, i am forever changed. i truly believe that what i saw was a true ufo. no question in my mind, yet i am anxious and willing to do whatever it takes to investigate this occurance, nothing like this has ever happened to me, and although i have always been very openminded to the possibility, i never truly had faith in something like this until now. i have this feeling that no one will believe me. but frankly, i could care less. i know myself, my friends and family know me, and i know that i'm not lying or pulling a prank or trying to gain recognition etc. these photos are as real as they come and i encourage and truly plead with those in the position to investigate and who have researched these events, to please call me, contact me, etc., and i will do anything and everything to help you. i want to know what i saw. please please contact me or send me info on someone else i can contact. i don't want a huge amount of time to go by before this is researched and analyzed. mainly because i want to be of the greatest assistance, and i'd like everything to be fresh in my mind as well as the photos. please note, i have 9 pictures in sequence, and i could not upload them all. in the first picture you will see the pink glow around the orb, this was taken a few pictures into the series. the next photo shows the orb moving a great distance upward. also, on the center right hand side, there are the 3 bright dots. it may not come across as clear uploaded from my computer as it does on my iphone. and the third shows it even higher in the sky.
content.summary: I photographed a beautiful cloud formation with the sun shining through it, and when i got home to check the photos, a fast moving orb appeared in 7 out of nine of the photos.

content.detailedDescription:
I need to know if anyone else saw the same thing i saw. i was in lenexa, ks on august 8, 20111 driving to lunch on lenexa dr. at 12:17pm and saw a strange black object in the sky just above the rooftops of my business complex. i was driving my car and noticed that it was not a balloon, kite, blimp, trash bag, airplane, rc plane or anything that i had really ever seen before in my life. it was very deliberate in its trek across the sky and dead silent. but it was unobtrusive almost so dumb-looking as if to deliberately not catch anyones eye. i am sure most people thought it was normal trash or debris that occasionally blows up in the air, but it wasnt windy at all this day. it was a very peculiar and strange object.  
i went through a logical progression of what could this be but as i slowed my car down and even thought about getting out, the thing acted like it noticed me and seemed to slightly increase speed and move faster away from me across the highway. it stayed on a deliberate trek from side of the highway to the other side without fluttering or changing height. that is what was weird about his object. not until it got to the other side of the highway did it slowly rise up further into the air and clouds. it just sort of disappeared as calmly as it appeared from the rooftops of the building.
i felt as if this thing was watching traffic. i felt as if it noticed me noticing it and it flew away because of my presence. i was so enamored that i drove around my lunch hour trying to find this thing on the other side of the highway. i cannot explain it. it was a strange feeling. i know many out there will dismiss this as a balloon or other inflatable device, but i have never seen a trash bag, balloon, kite, or anything like this move the way it did. it was like a perfectly cubed blimp. it went in a straight, horizontal line across the highway, and then ascended toward the clouds. i am not saying it was et, but it was controlled object. i have never seen anything like this before!
content.summary: Square black drone-type object hovering over office complex and mid-day highway traffic.

content.detailedDescription: I usually sit out in the parking lot where i work in commerce city and watch as different planes fly overhead.  we're located just south of one of the major east/west flight patterns and probably 20 miles southwest of dia.  i immediately noticed a lack of aircraft when i went outside at 5pm as obviously, it's in the middle of rush hour.  about 5 minutes later, i noticed the object and it didn't appear to be moving at all.  the object was 40,000 feet or higher; maybe a lot higher and it was stationery.  from our location, it looked like it was maybe above buckley air natl. guard base.  when i saw it, i immediately walked over to a car where a co-employee was taking a break.  i pointed out the object to him though it took awhile for him to see it as it was very small and pretty far away.  after about a minute, he saw the object too.  we both watched it for about 3 minutes and then i walked away to around the corner of our building where i had noticed a couple of other co-employees as our break  began.  they weren't there but the object was still up there.  i joined my other co-employee and we watched it for a couple of more minutes but had to go back into work.  i did not see it leave, but as i looked down towards the ground to keep from tripping as i was walking back in and then looked back up and it was gone.  my co-employee didn't see it leave either and stated he'd never seen anything like that.  as we watched, at least 3 clouds passed by.  the object disappeared behind the clouds but it could be immediately seen again after cloud passed by and in fact, one of the clouds was less dense than the others and we could see the object right through it.  again, very, very few aircaft visible across the entire east metro area that we could see and didn't see any military aircraft in the area though it's still pretty far from where we work.  i have no idea what it was, but it wasn't natural and i've never seen anything like it.  i'm totally fascinated by the possibilities of ufo's having always wanted to see something since i was about 6 years old living in pueblo when i saw something very close to what i saw yesterday only the object was shining.  this object again, was small, white (not glossy or shining)and was stationary the whole time.  i don't believe it was a star or a planet.
content.summary: Looked exactly like a small drop of white-out; the stuff that covers typing errors.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the street with five other adults between the ages of 35-45, all sober. we were talking about the fireworks that i had purchased and was about to light when out of the corner of my eye i saw a very fast moving object that caught my attention as well as the other 5 people.  as we watched it with pure amazement, i coudnt believe what i saw.  by the time i picked up on the ufo, it was right over the top of us flying from east to west at over mach 8 or greater. by the it reached the western horizon the object split into to two and then re emerged as one before dissapearing over the horizon.  it took about 7-10 seconds to fly from over top of us to the horizon and so, anyone that flies conventional aircraft would know that it would take much longer to fly that distance than that of our modern day aircraft.  

in summary, i have over 8000 hours of flight time as a cfii, atp, and have been flying private jets for over 14 years.  i have seen many things while flying at fl410 and greater to know that this sighting was not an aircraft.  all of us standing there saw the same thing.....It was not fireworks either.  only four of us wanted to talk about it, the other two i think either did not know enough about aviation or had enough common sense or, simple were in denial about the sighting.  one of the guys is a radio disc jockey for a big station in detroit so i think that he felt that he talked about it that he would be compelled to anounce it on his next radio session.  anyway, call it what you will but i/we know what we saw.  please feel free to drop me a message if you have any comments or questions.

regards
content.summary: This object flew from east to west at over mach 8 and changed directions 2 times very smoothly. i am a atp with 8000 hours, this was not created by earthbound engineering.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were sitting by the pool outside in the evening when we were in high school.  i don't remember the exact day/time/year.  it seemed like all of a sudden a craft appeared in our sight just above the trees about 150 feet away and decended behind the trees out of our sight.  it had blinking lights around the midsection.  didn't hear any sound but could make out the shape.  it was right around dusk, we could see it clearly although couldn't make out small details.  

this was in south county, st. louis, mo around 1992.
content.summary: Typical saucer shaped craft with dome appeared just above the trees

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling from flagstaff arizona to silver city new mexico on august 4th.  a few miles before we got to redstone, nm in the gila national forest headed south on highway 15, i was looking out the rear left passenger window around 10:10 pm trying to identify the constellations i was seeing when suddenly a lighted object came flying towards our car at tremendous speed, i tried to alert the other people in the car but could not speak - they said i exhaled roughly and made an uff! sound.  they turned down the audio book we were listening to and asked what was wrong and i told them about seeing the ufo.  no one else was looking out at the sky at the time.  my first thought was that is not an airplane or anything we could make it flew way too fast.  it was saucer shaped - entire bottom was lit - but the top was dark. from the direction we were travelling it would have come from the southeast headed northwest.  at first it looked to me like it was headed straight for the car and it passed relatively low - much less than the height of a regular airplane - from far away it was just a very bright light but it grew bigger as it approached - by the time it crossed out of my sight over the car it was the size of just larger than a golf ball.  the sight of it took my breath away and that's why i couldn't yell - hey - its a ufo - besides - it was flying so fast - u would only see it if u were looking right at it at the time.  afterwards, everyone else was staring out the window to see if it would come back - while i was praying in the back seat that it would not - i was afraid.  we had no cell service and we were in the middle of nowhere...
content.summary: Object seen from horizon rushing towards our vehicle tremendous speed

content.detailedDescription: The;lkjtlk

I was out in the driveway 4 days ago around 5 a.M. 

i spotted a flying object that had irregular flight patterns. the object decended and then vanished into the air. then, i saw another one. i ran inside to get my wife and she came out into the driveway. we saw several star like objects moving in the sky over about 1/2 an hour. one decended at a rate that is impossible. i would estimate about 20,000 ft in less than 2 seconds. we then tracked one along and it completely vanished right in front of our eyes. we saw another one that moved across the sky and then stopped. less than a second later it took off at a speed that is absolutely impossible. i would estimate that it went from 0 to 5,000 mph or more instantaneously. we saw another one fly directly into a cloud that had lightning flashing. 

i have been out there every morning since that first experience and i have seen them every single day. at least 4 or 5 per night. they look like flying stars. i started taking my binoculars out with me and this is what i saw this morning.

2 of them flew right over my backyard. about 10 minutes apart....On the exact same flight path. i was standing behind my truck when the first one came by. i got my binoculars on it and i rested my elbows on the tailgate to keep the binoculars steady.

i saw a jellyfish type looking creature that appeared to be a living creature. it was oval shaped and had a black center. in fact, it much resembled a human blood cell. it had a glow in the dark type appearance that was blue. it appeared almost to be a blue glowing gelatin like substance surrounding some type of nucleus. it had a bulb type bottom and top and had like two bumps on either side that made it sort of look like a stretched out flying gelatin blue jellyfish saturn. sounds strange...But that is exactly what i saw and i saw it quite clearly. semi transparent. it's almost like you can see right inside it.

i have no idea what it could have been....My final best description is.... it was a blue, semi transparent, jellyfish like, dark nucleus in center, it appeared to be living, glowing, saturn type look to it. i ran inside to tell my wife, my adrenaline was pumping and my hands and voice were shaking. i simply could not believe i actually saw one close enough to see what it is. i tracked it for as long as i could and it vanished in the distance. another one came by about 10 minutes later but i could not get a look at it like the first one. i know what i saw. i never really believed before but i know....There are unknown things flying in the sky. no one can ever convince me that there is not something out there because i clearly saw it. truly unbelievable.
content.summary: Oval shaped flying jellyfish looking ufo. dark center, looks like a living creature.
